title: The Lenovo Yoga A940 is a Surface Studio competitor
description: The new Lenovo Yoga A940 has a hinge thats similar to Microsofts Surface Studio. The Yoga A940 is an all-in-one PC targeted towards content creators, and it includes a stylus and a precision dial to adjust content in apps like Adobe Photoshop. But it also has some neat advantages: the precision dial can be switched to the other side, while the base station includes a dock for your keyboard and mouse. Its also got a wireless charger built in, and on top of all that, the PCs storage and RAM are upgradable.
